__TOC__

The Ubuntu LoCo teams need <nowiki>[[LoCoGettingApproved |approval by the Ubuntu LoCo Council]]</nowiki>.
In 2006, the Belgian team applied for the first time.

The Two Year Review helps an existing LoCo team to stay on track, and is a requirement to stay approved.
